about_the_game:
Humanity survives generations underground. Its engineers and scientists created the S.A.M (Survival Autonomous Machine) machine to explore the dangers underground, as the planet's surface appears desolate!

Radiation emitted by laboratory-grown creatures has contaminated surface air and animals, creating bizarre mutations and amalgamations in terrestrial beings. Over time, these creatures also spread underground, forcing humans to erect a fortified base to protect themselves. With supplies running low, humans developed S.A.M to obtain resources without exposing the population to risk.

The S.A.M is then sent on dangerous missions to acquire resources, blueprints and instructions from other civilizations, allowing the creation of new equipment that will enable it to go further. Furthermore, S.A.M will unravel the details of how everything happened to humanity as we know it, by bringing together photos, artifacts and utensils from the ancient surface civilization. This will reveal the beauty of the Earth and unravel many mysteries of humanity before the event called DYSTOPIA!

Collect semiconductors to create "Memory Nexus" slots and unlock new abilities.

Strategically plan gear combinations in each mission to explore specific parts of the map.

Remember: don't die! Because you will lose many of the precious resources you acquired. Humanity depends on the success of its mission!

Here at Albistudios, we believe a game only truly comes to life when the players get involved. That’s why your feedback is so important to us! We want to hear what you think about the game, what you’re enjoying, and what could be better.

Every opinion you share helps our team fine-tune details, fix bugs, and even come up with new ideas to make the game even more awesome. Our goal is to create games that really connect with players, and the best way to do that is by listening directly to you.

So, don’t be shy! Whether it’s a suggestion, critique, or compliment, we’re ready to hear it and use it to keep improving. Thanks for playing with us and for helping our games evolve!
